abstract: The Boy Scouts of America will be launching a new badge for geocaching, a game that involves the searching for treasure outdoors using a GPS device.
snippet: The Boy Scouts of America will be launching a new badge for geocaching, a game that involves the searching for treasure outdoors using a GPS device.
lead_paragraph: I wasn’t a very good Boy Scout when I signed-up at 6 years old. It wasn’t that I didn’t have fun traipsing around the woods — instead, I spent most of my time daydreaming about my brand new computer, a 1982 ZX Spectrum.

headline.main: Boy Scouts Add a New Digital Badge
